Uses of Class
pitt.search.semanticvectors.TermVectorsFromLucene

  • Packages that use TermVectorsFromLucene 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.

    • Uses of TermVectorsFromLucene in pitt.search.semanticvectors

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TermVectorsFromLucene TermVectorsFromLucene.createTermBasedRRIVectors(FlagConfig flagConfig)
      Generates an elemental vector for each term.
      static TermVectorsFromLucene TermVectorsFromLucene.createTermVectorsFromLucene(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalDocVectors)
      Creates term vectors from a Lucene index.
